Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: terrier muzzle
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The dog-like muzzle of a yorkshire terrier.

values.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a terrier. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult outside of barks and whines, but eating is easier.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a terrier. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with speaking.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: canine
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Fluffy, soft dog ears flick around at the sides of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They are incredibly cute.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: terrier tail
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A fluffy terrier tail points out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s back. Was that a small wag just then?
